message.title: Notification
message.description: Attention!! Hello guys,Attention to all DramaFlix fans! We’re currently experiencing some issues with the app on the Play Store. To stay updated on the latest news and developments about DramaFlix, please follow us on Facebook. Don’t forget to like and follow our page to ensure you don’t miss any important updates and let’s keep enjoying dramas together with a smile! 😊 Happy watching Enjoy 🙏😕, thank you very much all..hwaiting! gamsahapnida.🌟🚀..FOLLOW ME ON FACEBOOK FOR INFORMATION PLEASE JOIN ME CLICK OPEN !!! >.
